welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Fort Mill, the charming city known for its historic sites and beautiful landscapes. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rock Hill Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Charlotte Douglas Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A primarily serves American Airlines flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B serves a variety of airlines, including Delta and United.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C serves a variety of airlines, including JetBlue and Southwest.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: Concourse D serves a variety of airlines, including Frontier and Spirit.

terminals.name: Concourse E
terminals.description: Concourse E serves international flights and is connected to the main terminal by a walkway.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Concord-Padgett Regional Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Concord-Padgett Regional Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
